description: **Garnier Fructis Full and Plush Fortifying Shampoo with Pomegranate, Hair is almost entirely made up of protein, which gives hair its strength. All-new, paraben-free Fructis formulas with Active Fruit Protein, an exclusive combination of citrus protein, Vitamins B3 B6, fruit plant-derived extracts, and strengthening conditioners, are designed for healthier, stronger hair. Lightweight Fructis Full Plush Shampoo Volumizing with Pomegranate volumizes adult hair by strand for healthy-looking thickness and plush softness with natural fluid movement.** * Garnier Fructis Plush Fortifying Shampoo with Pomegranate, Volumizing for Fine Hair 12.5 fl oz * Get visibly fuller adult hair with full and plush shampoo, conditioner and leave-in treatment * Lightweight fortifying shampoo with pomegranate volumizes fine, flat hair strand by strand * Gives hair healthy-looking thickness and plush softness with natural fluid movement * Vitamins B3 & B6, fruit & plant-derived extracts, and strengthening conditioners, are designed for healthier, stronger hair.  * Hair is almost entirely made up of protein, which gives hair its strength.
shortDescription: Garnier Fructis Plush Fortifying Shampoo with Pomegranate, Volumizing for Fine Hair 12.5 fl oz
title: Garnier Fructis Plush Fortifying Shampoo

description: **Build up magnificent body with Kerastase Densifique Bain Densite, a highly effective volumizing shampoo for thin hair. Everyday life stressors, thermal styling and harsh environmental pollutants take a toll on hair. If hair has been thinning and has lost bounce and vibrancy, this is the best hydrating shampoo to return it to a soft and healthy looking state. This powerhouse cleanser transforms limp locks into a mane that looks visibly full and bounces with every step. The addition of Stemoxydine, an advanced densifying molecule, provides tresses with enviable body and density. Formulated with hyaluronic acid, this shampoo fortifies each strand from root to tip, giving it the resilience it needs to stand up against everyday hair dangers. The potent combination of Power Renewal Complex and Ceramide technology deeply penetrates hair fibers, imparting strength and extra shine. With Gluco-Peptide, this shampoo smooths hair cuticles to restore tresses to a manageable state that radiates body, shine, smoothness and health. Don't suffer with thinning hair when Kerastase can help you obtain the full flowing locks you dream of.** * Everyday life stressors thermal styling and harsh environmental pollutants take a toll on hair * Bodifying Shampoo * If hair has been thinning and has lost bounce and vibrancy this is the best hydrating shampoo to return it to a soft and healthy looking state
shortDescription: Kérastase Densifique Bodifying Shampoo and Conditioner
title: Kerastase Densifique Bain Densite Shampoo 8.5 oz

These formulas combine the latest innovations in ingredient technology with best-in-class ingredients to create a new standard.**
shortDescription: ColorProof SuperPlump Thickening Blow Dry Spray - Color-Safe, Volumizing, Vegan, Sulfate-Free, Salt-Free, Unisex - Professional Hair Product

description: What it is: Convenient doesn't begin to describe Joico's superstar Moisture Recovery Co+Wash. They've merged their most cleansing shampoo and nourishing conditioner (designed to infuse dry, brittle hair with intensive, repair ingredients)...saving you time, money, and breakage with one just a single dollop of this aerated, sulfate-free, ultra-rich cream. Use just a tiny bit, and you'll have slip-and-slide shine in an instant. Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Decyl Glucoside, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Isobutane, Glycerin, Ceteareth-20, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Cocodimonium Hydroxypropyl Hydrolyzed Keratin, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Pentapeptide-30 Cysteinamide, Pentapeptide-29 Cysteinamide, Tetrapeptide-29 Argininamide, Tetrapeptide-28 Argininamide, Hydrolyzed Algin, Sea Water/Maris Aqua/Eau De Mer, Chlorella Vulgaris Extract, Bis-Diisopropanolamino-PG-Propyl Dimethicone/Bis-Isobutyl PEG-14 Copolymer, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Quaternium-91, Amodimethicone, Citric Acid, DMDM Hydantoin, Polyquaternium-7, Tetrasodium EDTA, Myristyl Myristate, Polysorbate 20, Butyloctanol, Trideceth-12, Cetrimonium Chloride, Ceteareth-7, Ceteareth-25, Magnesium Nitrate, Stearyl Dihydroxypropyldimonium Oligosaccharides, Propylene Glycol, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Magnesium Chloride, Methylisothiazolinone, Isopropyl Alcohol, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Fragrance/Parfum.Dispense, emulsify and apply to wet hair. Leave in 5 minutes. Rinse. Product Options Available are as follows: Size : 8.5 oz - Joico Curl Co-Wash Whipped Cleansing Conditioner Dry Hair.
shortDescription: Joico's superstar Moisture Recovery Co+Wash have merged their most cleansing shampoo and nourishing conditioner (designed to infuse dry, brittle hair with intensive, repair ingredients)...saving you time, money, and breakage with one just a single dollop of this aerated, sulfate-free, ultra-rich cream. Use just a tiny bit, and you'll have slip-and-slide shine in an instant.
title: Joico Curl Co-Wash Whipped Cleansing Conditioner Dry Hair Size : 8.5 Oz

description: * Moisturizing Hair Treatment - 8 Second Wonder Water Lamellar Hair Treatment is the new generation of premium hair treatment. This liquid rinse out formula visibly transforms hair from the first use * 8 Seconds to Silkier, Shinier Hair - Upon contact with wet hair, this treatment works in just 8 seconds to visibly transform hair in a single use. Damaged hair feels healthy, shiny, and silky * Expert Treatments - Our Elvive line features powerful treatments formulated with superior technology to revive all forms of hair damage, whether it's from heat styling, color processing, or dryness * Use on wet hair after shampoo, 1 dose for fine to medium hair, 2-3 doses for thick or curly hair, add 1 more dose if you have long hair - Apply to lengths, avoid scalp. Follow with conditioner and blow dry for optimal results * L'Oreal Paris Beauty - A leading total beauty care company based in Paris, we offer innovative products and unique expertise from beauty experts in makeup, skin care, hair care, styling and hair color
shortDescription: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Wonder Water Hair Transforming Lamellar Rinse Out, Wonder Water Lamellar Technology is 8 seconds to silkier, shinier, healthier looking hair. A new generation of premium treatment.
title: L'Oreal Paris Elvive Wonder Water Hair Transforming Lamellar Rinse Out Scalp Care for Normal Hair, 6.8 fl oz
